sentence.Network_en: All foreign troops must be withdrawn immediately and unconditionally.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有外国军队必须立即无条件地撤出.

sentence.Network_en: It makes things very awkward to have your girls going back unconditionally just now!
sentence.Network_cn: 你们现在是无条件上工,真糟糕!

计算机英语专业词汇 - 豆丁网 ... branch statement 分支语句，转移语句 branch unconditionally 无条件转移 branching 分支（的）.

entry.def: If you describe something as unconditional, you mean that the person doing or giving it does not require anything to be done by other people in exchange.

example.tran: 孩子们需要无条件的爱。

example.ex: The leader of the revolt made an unconditional surrender early this morning.
example.tran: 今天上午早些时候，反叛的首领无条件投降。

auth_sentence.content: Of course most people love their children, unconditionally.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course most people love their children, unconditionally.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course most people love their children, unconditionally.

auth_sentence.content: That is not a commitment that should be made unconditionally.
auth_sentence.res_content: That is not a commitment that should be made unconditionally.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is not a commitment that should be made unconditionally.

auth_sentence.content: So if the government is really serious then it should resign unconditionally.
auth_sentence.res_content: So if the government is really serious then it should resign unconditionally.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So if the government is really serious then it should resign unconditionally.
